name: Romaine Salad With Lemon-Cumin Dressing
keywords: cumin, lemon juice, romaine, vegan, vegetarian, winter
recipeIngredient: A few grinds fresh black pepper
2 large heads romaine lettuce, rinsed, dried and torn into bite size pieces

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, whisk together the lemon juice, cumin, salt and pepper. Very slowly whisk in the oil. Place the lettuce in a large salad bowl and toss with the dressing.
